start: ^Hey, can I get anything for ya?
idle: ^Sorry we're low on stock - you came at a bad time.^P^B
^Most of the town has been out on a big fishing trip for the past week.^P^B
^Truth is, it's been harder and harder to find fish...^P Nobody's really sure why, but I think -^1^B
too_expensive: ^Ah! Sorry, I won't part with it for less. Money's tight.
compass: ^A compass? We've got tons of these. They're handy for navigating the open ocean, but I'm sure you'll find your own use for it.
seashell: ^These seashells are very popular over in the city, but they're pretty common around here.
haddock: ^The whole town's low on fish right now, but I'll get you what I can.
generic: ^Can I help you with anything else?
afishionado: ^If you're a fan of fish, this little trinket will help you get the best flavor out of anything you catch!
windbreaker: ^The winds can get rough around here at night - this will help you resist them a little bit.
